TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SendMessageContent extends System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendContent

Docs.summary: A class used to send a single item (message) to or from a workflow service. The item can be a built-in type such as primitive types, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>, or <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>; or an application-defined data contract, message contract, or XML serializable type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When using this class, messages serialized on the wire are unwrapped, unless the data is a message contract type or of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>.
## Examples The following example shows how to use a SendMessageContent instance with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity.
[!code-cs[ContentBasedCorrelation#0](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ac_13_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Activities.InArgument message, class System.Type declaredMessageType) cil managed

Docs.param: The data type that appears on the service description. It must be the same type as `message` or any base type of `message`.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified message and message type.
Gets or sets the declared message type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DeclaredMessageTypeis the data type that will appear on the service description and WSDL. You may want the service description to contain the base class type so that various derived classes can be sent and received by the service at runtime. DeclaredMessageType must be either the same as the argument type of the Message property or its base type.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data to send.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ShouldSerializeDeclaredMessageType() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent.DeclaredMessageType%2A> property should be XAML-serialized.
Docs.returns: if the property should be serialized; otherwise .
